field.name: description
field.value:
This trips up the coloriser: #component(QuestionComponent "%{question = $Question}") I need to add a space before the } like so for it to be correctly colored: #component(QuestionComponent "%{question = $Question }") Here's the whole view in case it's needed to reproduce the problem: #set ($alt = 1) #foreach($Question in $directoryItem.Questions) #if(!$Question.Question.ParentQuestion) #set ($alt = 1 - $alt) #end
#component(QuestionComponent "%{question = $Question}")
#end
